SEARCH
Package org.fluentjdbc

Interface DatabaseUpdatable<T extends DatabaseUpdatable<T>>

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseInsertBuilder, DatabaseInsertOrUpdateBuilder, DatabaseUpdateBuilder, DbContextInsertBuilder, DbContextInsertOrUpdateBuilder, DbContextUpdateBuilder
public interface DatabaseUpdatable<T extends DatabaseUpdatable<T>>
Interface to enforce consistent behavior of INSERT and UPDATE builders

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    T
    setField(String field, Object value)
    Adds the fieldName to the SQL statement and the value to the parameter list
    T
    setField(String field, String expression, Collection<?> values)
    Adds the fieldName to the SQL statement with the expression and the values to the parameter list
    default T
    setFieldIfPresent(String field, Object value)
    Adds the fieldName to the SQL statement and the value to the parameter list, unless value is null
    T
    setFields(List<String> fields, List<?> values)
    Calls setField(String, Object) for each fieldName and parameter
    T
    setFields(Map<String,?> fields)
    Calls setField(String, Object) for each key and value in the parameter map

  • Method Details

    • setField

      @CheckReturnValue T setField(String field, @Nullable Object value)
      Adds the fieldName to the SQL statement and the value to the parameter list

    • setField

      @CheckReturnValue T setField(String field, String expression, Collection<?> values)
      Adds the fieldName to the SQL statement with the expression and the values to the parameter list

    • setFields

      @CheckReturnValue T setFields(List<String> fields, List<?> values)
      Calls setField(String, Object) for each fieldName and parameter

    • setFields

      @CheckReturnValue T setFields(Map<String,?> fields)
      Calls setField(String, Object) for each key and value in the parameter map

    • setFieldIfPresent

      @CheckReturnValue default T setFieldIfPresent(String field, @Nullable Object value)
      Adds the fieldName to the SQL statement and the value to the parameter list, unless value is null
